com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.util.time

Interface TimestampProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Timestamps

    public interface TimestampProvider
    System time interface that abstracts time units, resolution, and measurements of time.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Timepoint getTime()
      Returns the current time based on this timestamp provider as a Timepoint.
      Timepoint getTime(long sinceEpoch, TimeUnit unit)
      Returns the given time as a Timepoint based off of this timestamp provider
      Timer getTimer()
      Returns a Timer based on this timestamp provider
      TimeUnit getUnit()
      Return the units of getTime().
      void sleepFor(Duration duration)
      Sleep for the given duration of time.
      Timepoint sleepPast(Timepoint futureTime)
      Block until the current time as returned by getTime() is greater than the given timepoint.

    • Method Detail

      • getTime

        Returns the current time based on this timestamp provider as a Timepoint.

                  TimeUnit unit)
        Returns the given time as a Timepoint based off of this timestamp provider
        Parameters:
        sinceEpoch -
        unit -
        Returns:

      • getUnit

        TimeUnit getUnit()
        Return the units of getTime(). This method's return value must be constant over at least the life of the object implementing this interface.
        Returns:
        this instance's time unit

      • sleepPast

        Timepoint sleepPast(Timepoint futureTime)
             throws InterruptedException
        Block until the current time as returned by getTime() is greater than the given timepoint.
        Parameters:
        futureTime - The time to sleep past
        Returns:
        the current time in the same units as the unit argument
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if externally interrupted
